name: MORE SWEATER? OK! (Standalone)
description: MORE SWEATER? OK! is a hardcore game that merging the traditional Snake gameplay and Pacman together! You're the golden button, running away from the pursuing Snakes, collecting the stars and trying to survive on a random generated level as long as you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 2GHz or faster processor Memory: 768 MB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 5.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard AND mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.4GHz or faster processor DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection
